name: VoiceAttack
description: VoiceAttack takes your PC games and apps to a new level by adding your voice as an additional controller. With a comprehensive toolkit, you can design your very own macros to control virtually all aspects of your Windows experience or add a brand new layer of immersion into the latest sims!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, or 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 155 MB available space Additional Notes: USB headset recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 155 MB available space Additional Notes: USB headset recommended
